detail: sum of all lsaspes items (NA if lsaspes_percTotal < 1)

description: LSAS (parent report, Spanish), total anxiety score

description: LSAS (parent report, Spanish), interaction anxiety subscore
detail: sum of lsaspes items 1, 7, 11, 15, 17, 23, 33, 35, 37, 39, 43, and 45 (NA if lsaspes_percAnxInt< 1)

description: LSAS (parent report, Spanish), performance anxiety subscore
detail: sum of lsaspes items 3, 5, 9, 13, 19, 21, 25, 27, 29, 31, 41, and 47 (NA if lsaspes_percAnxPer< 1)

description: LSAS (parent report, Spanish), total avoidance score
detail: sum of all even-numbered lsaspes ('avoidance') items (NA if lsaspes_percTotAvo < 1)

description: LSAS (parent report, Spanish), avoidance of interaction subscore
detail: sum of lsaspes items 2, 8, 12, 16, 18, 24, 34, 36, 38, 40, 44, and 46 (NA if lsaspes_percAvoInt< 1)

description: LSAS (parent report, Spanish), avoidance of performance subscore
detail: sum of lsaspes items 4, 6, 10, 14, 20, 22, 26, 28, 30, 32, 42, and 48 (NA if lsaspes_percAvoPer< 1)
